name: TABLE TENNIS INFINITY
description: Take the excitement of a PING PONG table on the go with TABLE TENNIS INFINITY! In this exciting portable version, move your paddle with the touch screen to hit the balls. The speed increases as your score goes up - endless fun for everyone!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
